column6: As Daredevil fights to find the source of new and violent trouble in Hell's Kitchen, Matt Murdock struggles to piece his life back together. But when a woman from his past enters the picture, it could all go flying off the rails.
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | inker:Stefano Gaudiano | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | penciller:Michael Lark | letterer:Cory Petit
